data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guan, Wei, Li, Houhun (2015): Review of the genus Hieromantis Meyrick from China, with descriptions of three new species (Lepidoptera, Stathmopodidae). ZooKeys 534: 85-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.534.5997, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.534.5997
